name: Trading on a Shoestring
title: Minimal Stock Market Activity
description: In 2021, Barbados recorded a total stock trading value of just $220,000, marking one of the lowest levels globally.

name: Designs in Hibernation
title: Scarce Industrial Design Innovations
description: Barbados had only 1 resident industrial design application in 2017, indicating limited activity in this creative sector.

name: Social Safety Net
title: Limited Social Contributions
description: In 2016, Barbados's social contributions amounted to 239,182 local currency units, reflecting a modest level of social welfare support.
